coaster.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a small thin object on which you put a glass, or cup, to protect a table from heat or liquids
coaster.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a ship that sails from port to port along a coast, but does not go further out to sea
coaster.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a small ship that carries goods between ports within a country, but does not go to foreign ports
coaster.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: A small coaster was discharging timber.
